jathika saradharma adhyapana padaname jathika sanwidhayaka, mathara pradeshiya shasanarakshaka balamandalaye (1996 – 2000) dahampasal anukamitu lekam, mathara disthrik dahampasal guru sanwardhana aayathanaye adhyaksha (1993 – 2003), aadi thanathuru gananawakma hadaru ee mahatha kalaniya wishwa widyalaye waidya pitaye pera simawasika (1998 – 2003) puhunu waidyawarayeki.
